com.topcoder.service.user
Class UserServiceFault

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.service.user.UserServiceFault
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class UserServiceFault
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents the "user_service_fault" element in WSDL. It's contained in the related exception-message class. It was generated by JBoss tools and I changed the name and other little changes.

Updated for Jira and Confluence User Sync Widget 1.0 - Correct few of JavaDoc comments.

This class is not thread safe because it's highly mutable

Since:
Cockpit Release Assembly for Receipts
Version:
1.0
Author:
snow01
